SubSections.Title: Create Fire
SubSections.Content: Summon a small flame that persists until naturally extinguished. Used for lighting torches, igniting objects, or generating warmth.

SubSections.Title: Control Fire
SubSections.Content: Manipulate the size, direction, and intensity of existing flames.

SubSections.Title: Heat Manipulation
SubSections.Content: Adjust the temperature of objects or small areas to prevent freezing or create warmth.

SubSections.Title: Heat Vision
SubSections.Content: Sense sources of warmth in the environment, including recent body heat or electronic devices still dissipating thermal energy.

SubSections.Title: Fireproof Object
SubSections.Content: Temporarily infuse an object with resistance to heat and flames, preventing it from burning under normal conditions.

SubSections.Title: Control Water
SubSections.Content: Freely move around small volumes of nearby water.

SubSections.Title: Purify Water
SubSections.Content: Remove toxins, salt, or filth from water, making it drinkable.

SubSections.Title: Freeze Water
SubSections.Content: Rapidly freeze a small body of water, creating ice barriers or surfaces.

SubSections.Title: Condense Humidity
SubSections.Content: Pull moisture from the air to generate water for drinking, rituals, or dampening flames.

SubSections.Title: Walk On Water
SubSections.Content: Temporarily freeze water beneath your feet.

SubSections.Title: Summon Mist
SubSections.Content: Generate a localized mist to obscure vision, reduce visibility, or aid stealth.

SubSections.Title: Control Earth
SubSections.Content: Freely move around nearby loose pieces of rocks, sand, metal, or similar.

SubSections.Title: Shape Stone
SubSections.Content: Reshape small rock formations, carve symbols, or soften terrain.

SubSections.Title: Strengthen Metal
SubSections.Content: Temporarily reinforce a metal object or structure to prevent breaking.

SubSections.Title: Digging Pulse
SubSections.Content: Send a controlled tremor through the ground to loosen soil, unearth objects, or detect underground structures.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Composition
SubSections.Content: Identify rock or metal compositions with touch, detecting impurities, rare minerals, or structural weaknesses.

SubSections.Title: Reshape Terrain
SubSections.Content: Subtly adjust the features of natural ground, smoothing paths, forming small trenches or walls, or reinforcing soft surfaces.

SubSections.Title: Lift
SubSections.Content: Move or keep a small object in the air.

SubSections.Title: Predict Weather
SubSections.Content: Analyze atmospheric conditions to accurately predict short-term weather patterns.

SubSections.Title: Amplify Sound
SubSections.Content: Enhance or focus existing sounds, making distant conversations or faint noises clearer.

SubSections.Title: Redirect Wind
SubSections.Content: Shift wind currents slightly to alter airflow indoors or change the trajectory of lightweight objects.

SubSections.Title: Suppress Sound
SubSections.Content: Reduce or nullify noise in a small area, aiding stealth or preventing eavesdropping.

SubSections.Title: Detect Air Quality
SubSections.Content: Identify toxins, pollution, or changes in breathable air composition, helping to avoid hazardous environments.

SubSections.Title: Sense Spatial Distortions
SubSections.Content: Detect anomalies such as teleportation residue, open portals, gravitational shifts, or dimensional instability.

SubSections.Title: Adjust Gravity
SubSections.Content: Alter the effect of gravity on yourself or a small object, making it lighter or heavier temporarily.

SubSections.Title: Wormhole
SubSections.Content: Create a wormhole between two nearby points to allow bidirectional travel.

SubSections.Title: Teleport
SubSections.Content: Teleport yourself or a nearby small object to a nearby point.

SubSections.Title: Fold Perception
SubSections.Content: Slightly alter perception of distances, making objects or locations appear closer or farther than they actually are. This can also be used to trick people into walking in circles.

SubSections.Title: Create Light
SubSections.Content: Summon or intensify light in an area, illuminating dark spaces or blinding weak-sighted creatures.

SubSections.Title: Remove Light
SubSections.Content: Darken an area, reducing the effectiveness of light sources.

SubSections.Title: Bend Light
SubSections.Content: Refract or redirect light to alter visibility, either making small objects invisible or creating visual distortions.

SubSections.Title: Sense Illusions
SubSections.Content: Detect the presence of visual illusions or light based holograms.

SubSections.Title: Photographic Memory
SubSections.Content: Retain a perfect mental snapshot of a scene, or retrieve details from distant memory.

SubSections.Title: Charge Object
SubSections.Content: Infuse a small object with static electricity, allowing it to deliver a weak shock on touch or interact with minor electronic components.

SubSections.Title: Detect Electrical Flow
SubSections.Content: Sense the movement of electrical currents in nearby objects, helping to locate hidden power sources or determine electronic function, as well as identifying the electronic layout of an electronic circuit.

SubSections.Title: Amplify Signal
SubSections.Content: Strengthen or extend the range of radio, cybernetic, or magical communication signals using electrical resonance.

SubSections.Title: Disrupt Electronics
SubSections.Content: Create a brief electromagnetic pulse that temporarily disables or scrambles nearby electronic devices.

SubSections.Title: Ionize
SubSections.Content: Alter the conductivity of an object.

SubSections.Title: Overload
SubSections.Content: Short circuit electricity to cause disruptions, fire, or explosions.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Corrosive Substances
SubSections.Content: Determine the chemical composition and origin of acidic or corrosive substances.

SubSections.Title: Neutralize Corrosion
SubSections.Content: Prevent further decay or damage from acid by applying an alchemical neutralizer or magical reinforcement.

SubSections.Title: Enhance Solubility
SubSections.Content: Temporarily increase a substance’s ability to dissolve into another liquid or spread more efficiently.

SubSections.Title: Corrode Object
SubSections.Content: Slowly corrode a hole or pathway through an object.

SubSections.Title: Alter Flammability
SubSections.Content: Temporarily adjust the flammability of a fluid or object.

SubSections.Title: Perform An Oracle
SubSections.Content: Invoke a cosmic or divine entity to receive cryptic guidance to a question.

SubSections.Title: Read Fate Threads
SubSections.Content: Detect minor shifts in probability, sensing likely short term outcomes.

SubSections.Title: See The Unseen
SubSections.Content: Perceive magical auras, invisible entities, or hidden forces temporarily.

SubSections.Title: Scry A Location
SubSections.Content: See partial or distorted visions of a far off place.

SubSections.Title: Interpret Omens
SubSections.Content: Recognize patterns or coincidences in surroundings to predict an unexpected event.

SubSections.Title: Dowsing
SubSections.Content: Use a ritual or intuition to locate a desired object, such as water, metals, or hidden pathways.

SubSections.Title: Speak To The Dead
SubSections.Content: Call upon the essence of a recently deceased soul for limited questioning. The spirit retains some of the knowledge it had in life depending on personal relevance, which decreases as it ages and its soul grows weaker.

SubSections.Title: Sense Spirits
SubSections.Content: Detect lingering spirits or supernatural entities in an area.

SubSections.Title: Bind Spirit
SubSections.Content: Temporarily bind an unrestrained spirit to an object or location.

SubSections.Title: Call Spirit
SubSections.Content: Summon a spirit to briefly ward off supernatural interference or provide limited guidance.

SubSections.Title: Lend Body
SubSections.Content: Temporarily allow another spirit to take over control of your body.

SubSections.Title: Extract Memories
SubSections.Content: Read residual emotions or impressions left on an object by a strong willed user.

SubSections.Title: Recall Will
SubSections.Content: Experience the strongest wishes and desires of a soul.

SubSections.Title: Anchor Soul
SubSections.Content: Prevent a soul from departing a dying body for a short period.

SubSections.Title: Sense Emotions
SubSections.Content: Detect a person’s emotional state by perceiving their spiritual energy.

SubSections.Title: Imprint Message
SubSections.Content: Imprint a part of your soul into an object to leave behind a message, which activates upon touch of chosen targets.

SubSections.Title: Create Undead
SubSections.Content: Temporarily bind a soul to a body to take over partial control of a corpse. The corpse will move oddly and cannot speak.

SubSections.Title: Leave Body
SubSections.Content: Send a part of or your whole soul out of your body to scout the area, through walls and the ground, for a short time. During this activity, both your soul and your body are vulnerable.

SubSections.Title: Mark Of Blood
SubSections.Content: Bind a personal signature to a person using your blood for tracking.

SubSections.Title: Blood Puppet
SubSections.Content: Temporarily take over partial control of a weak person. The person will move oddly and speak very slowly.

SubSections.Title: Sense Lineage
SubSections.Content: Detect a person's ancestry or blood ties with physical contact or blood samples.

SubSections.Title: Blood Compass
SubSections.Content: Use a blood sample of a person to determine the direction towards it.

SubSections.Title: Control Blood
SubSections.Content: Freely move around small volumes of nearby loose blood.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Alchemical Properties
SubSections.Content: Identify the composition of liquids, gas, or solids to determine alchemical properties, potential effects, or toxicity.

SubSections.Title: Transmute Materials
SubSections.Content: Alter the physical properties of a basic material, such as turning soft metal rigid or making stone temporarily malleable.

SubSections.Title: Neutralize Toxins
SubSections.Content: Create a counteragent to purge or weaken poisons, drugs, or other hazardous substances.

SubSections.Title: Stabilize Mixture
SubSections.Content: Prevent volatile substances from degrading, spoiling, or reacting unintentionally over time.

SubSections.Title: Detect Residue
SubSections.Content: Identify traces of alchemical substances on surfaces, containers, or within a person’s system.

SubSections.Title: Distill
SubSections.Content: Separate a liquid into its liquid and non liquid components.

SubSections.Title: Calculate Fate
SubSections.Content: Analyze the stars to calculate the likelihood of a certain event.

SubSections.Title: Astrological Mapping
SubSections.Content: Infer rough location, direction, and time based on cosmic alignments.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Relationship
SubSections.Content: Consult celestial alignments to determine potential problems as well as compatibility between two individuals.

SubSections.Title: Astrocriminal Profiling
SubSections.Content: Use birth charts and planetary alignments to predict the behavior or habits of a target, helping in surveillance or interrogation.

SubSections.Title: Star Shifting
SubSections.Content: Increase the likelihood for a certain event to happen. This works better the more natural it is, such as common natural catastrophes like earth quakes, meteor showers, sand storms, or volcano eruptions.

SubSections.Title: Dispel Minor Magic
SubSections.Content: Remove a weak enchantment or magical effect.

SubSections.Title: Detect Magic
SubSections.Content: Sense magical energies and identify their nature.

SubSections.Title: Anti Magic Barrier
SubSections.Content: Shield an area from weak magical intrusion.

SubSections.Title: Break Wards
SubSections.Content: Disable or bypass a basic magical barrier.

SubSections.Title: Find Array Weakness
SubSections.Content: Determine the weak points of an array or similar formation.

SubSections.Title: Suppress Magic
SubSections.Content: Temporarily suppress lingering magical effects in an area, such as weak enchantments or illusions.

SubSections.Title: Bad Luck
SubSections.Content: Curse someone with bad luck for period of time.

SubSections.Title: Detect Curses
SubSections.Content: Identify if someone or something has been cursed.

SubSections.Title: Remove Curse
SubSections.Content: End a curse on someone.

SubSections.Title: Identify Ritual Components
SubSections.Content: Analyze mystical objects or drawn symbols to determine their purpose, origin, or effects in rituals.

SubSections.Title: Ward Against Possession
SubSections.Content: Prepare an individual or object with protective measures to block mind-altering influences or entity takeovers.

SubSections.Title: Alter Causality Chain
SubSections.Content: Change minor events in recent history, such as letting go of a pen, by affecting quantum probability retroactively.

SubSections.Title: Quantum Paradox Shield
SubSections.Content: Protect yourself or a nearby area from reality breaking effects, such as teleportation or causality alteration, by becoming an uncertainty factor in localized physics.

SubSections.Title: Time Dilution
SubSections.Content: Slow or accelerate time locally by manipulating localized quantum probability waves. If you slow yourself, the outside will appear slow. If you speed up yourself, suddenly everything will be already over.

SubSections.Title: Collapse Probability
SubSections.Content: Force an uncertain event into a guaranteed outcome within small parameters.

SubSections.Title: Schrödinger's Packet
SubSections.Content: Create a small packet or letter with contents that are undetectable until opened. While closed, the contents make no sound, and their weight becomes evenly distributed among the packet.
